title: Micro Decisive Corps
description: There is a hidden spot at our school. It's in a small forest next to the school. It's called the [i]Ajinaga Jizo[/i] and it's unknown who built it or why. It was here before the school was built. Rumor is, if you pray to it, it will make you grow taller. It's secretly worshipped by the short boys and athletes...

matches.title: You Can Surrender to Mei as Many Times as You Want (Doujinshi)
Bokutachi wa Benkyou ga Dekinai - G&D (Doujinshi)
